General.Name: Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells packaging films in Thailand, Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company's products portfolio includes biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) films, polyester films, cast polypropylene (CPP) films, and metallized films. Its products are used in flexible packaging, publishing, flower wrap, adhesive tapes, label, textile bag, over wrap, fresh produce, and biodegradable applications. Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.
General.Address: 73/3 Moo 4, Bangna-Trad Road, Bang Phli, Thailand, 10540
